name: Mega Ramp - Formula Car Racing
description:
Mega Ramp Car Racing Games is a car driving game for free to perform car stunts over the ramp with multiple ram cars and unique vehicles. It’s one of the addictive racing games with driving stunts which will keep you busy playing a series of car driving games and enjoy a whole collection of stunt cars – mega ramp.

You can enjoy the ultimate car driving game with smooth and easy controls and biggest tracks. Perform impossible stunts with non-stop adventure & groovy impossible tracks to keep you engaged throughout the gameplay. A complete car driving and car stunts mission with impossible tracks to test your racing and thinking abilities to clear the ram car missions in this car racing game. The game looks simple, visually bright and groovy with excellent fast car controls. Make sure you clear all mega impossible track challenges with an extreme car driving impossible stunts. You can also hire professional car impossible stunts driver to keep you going with a better racing challenge.

How to stunt & control your car:
- You can accelerate to speed up and apply a brake to stop your sports car
- Stop and accelerate your monster cars at the right time to jump to another ramp
- Control your speed and twist your car steering to drift your vehicles
- Avoid getting hit by obstacles and falling off the ramp while car race will make you lose

Game Features:
- Biggest Impossible stunts ramp
- Addictive gameplay
- Smooth and easy controls
- Car racing
- Crazy stunts
- Multiple themes and ramps
- Fast sports cars and muscle cars
- Unique vehicles to race for fun
